00058 static int lmv_intent_remote(struct obd_export *exp, struct lookup_intent *it,
00059                              const struct lu_fid *parent_fid,
00060                              struct ptlrpc_request **reqp,
00061                              ldlm_blocking_callback cb_blocking,
00062                              __u64 extra_lock_flags)
00063 {
00064         struct obd_device       *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00065         struct lmv_obd          *lmv = &obd->u.lmv;
00066         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = NULL;
00067         struct lustre_handle    plock;
00068         struct md_op_data       *op_data;
00069         struct lmv_tgt_desc     *tgt;
00070         struct mdt_body         *body;
00071         int                     pmode;
00072         int                     rc = 0;
00073         ENTRY;
00074 
00075         body = req_capsule_server_get(&(*reqp)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00076         if (body == NULL)
00077                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00078 
00079         LASSERT((body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_MDS));
00080 
00081         /*
00082          * Unfortunately, we have to lie to MDC/MDS to retrieve
00083          * attributes llite needs and provideproper locking.
00084          */
00085         if (it->it_op & IT_LOOKUP)
00086                 it->it_op = IT_GETATTR;
00087 
00088         /*
00089          * We got LOOKUP lock, but we really need attrs.
00090          */
00091         pmode = it->it_lock_mode;
00092         if (pmode) {
00093                 plock.cookie = it->it_lock_handle;
00094                 it->it_lock_mode = 0;
00095                 it->it_request = NULL;
00096         }
00097 
00098         LASSERT(fid_is_sane(&body->mbo_fid1));
00099 
00100         tgt = lmv_find_target(lmv, &body->mbo_fid1);
00101         if (IS_ERR(tgt))
00102                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(tgt));
00103 
00104         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(op_data);
00105         if (op_data == NULL)
00106                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00107 
00108         op_data->op_fid1 = body->mbo_fid1;
00109         /* Sent the parent FID to the remote MDT */
00110         if (parent_fid != NULL) {
00111                 /* The parent fid is only for remote open to
00112                  * check whether the open is from OBF,
00113                  * see mdt_cross_open */
00114                 LASSERT(it->it_op & IT_OPEN);
00115                 op_data->op_fid2 = *parent_fid;
00116         }
00117 
00118         op_data->op_bias = MDS_CROSS_REF;
00119         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "REMOTE_INTENT with fid="DFID" -> mds #%u\n",
00120                PFID(&body->mbo_fid1), tgt->ltd_idx);
00121 
00122         rc = md_intent_lock(tgt->ltd_exp, op_data, it, &req, cb_blocking,
00123                             extra_lock_flags);
00124         if (rc)
00125                 GOTO(out_free_op_data, rc);
00126 
00127         /*
00128          * LLite needs LOOKUP lock to track dentry revocation in order to
00129          * maintain dcache consistency. Thus drop UPDATE|PERM lock here
00130          * and put LOOKUP in request.
00131          */
00132         if (it->it_lock_mode != 0) {
00133                 it->it_remote_lock_handle =
00134                                         it->it_lock_handle;
00135                 it->it_remote_lock_mode = it->it_lock_mode;
00136         }
00137 
00138         if (pmode) {
00139                 it->it_lock_handle = plock.cookie;
00140                 it->it_lock_mode = pmode;
00141         }
00142 
00143         EXIT;
00144 out_free_op_data:
00145         OBD_FREE_PTR(op_data);
00146 out:
00147         if (rc && pmode)
00148                 ldlm_lock_decref(&plock, pmode);
00149 
00150         ptlrpc_req_finished(*reqp);
00151         *reqp = req;
00152         return rc;
00153 }
00154 
00155 int lmv_revalidate_slaves(struct obd_export *exp,
00156                           const struct lmv_stripe_md *lsm,
00157                           ldlm_blocking_callback cb_blocking,
00158                           int extra_lock_flags)
00159 {
00160         struct obd_device      *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00161         struct lmv_obd         *lmv = &obd->u.lmv;
00162         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = NULL;
00163         struct mdt_body         *body;
00164         struct md_op_data      *op_data;
00165         int                     i;
00166         int                     rc = 0;
00167 
00168         ENTRY;
00169 
00174         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(op_data);
00175         if (op_data == NULL)
00176                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00177 
00182         for (i = 0; i < lsm->lsm_md_stripe_count; i++) {
00183                 struct lu_fid           fid;
00184                 struct lookup_intent    it = { .it_op = IT_GETATTR };
00185                 struct lustre_handle    *lockh = NULL;
00186                 struct lmv_tgt_desc     *tgt = NULL;
00187                 struct inode            *inode;
00188 
00189                 fid = lsm->lsm_md_oinfo[i].lmo_fid;
00190                 inode = lsm->lsm_md_oinfo[i].lmo_root;
00191 
00192                 /*
00193                  * Prepare op_data for revalidating. Note that @fid2 shluld be
00194                  * defined otherwise it will go to server and take new lock
00195                  * which is not needed here.
00196                  */
00197                 memset(op_data, 0, sizeof(*op_data));
00198                 op_data->op_fid1 = fid;
00199                 op_data->op_fid2 = fid;
00200 
00201                 tgt = lmv_locate_mds(lmv, op_data, &fid);
00202                 if (IS_ERR(tgt))
00203                         GOTO(cleanup, rc = PTR_ERR(tgt));
00204 
00205                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Revalidate slave "DFID" -> mds #%u\n",
00206                        PFID(&fid), tgt->ltd_idx);
00207 
00208                 if (req != NULL) {
00209                         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00210                         req = NULL;
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 rc = md_intent_lock(tgt->ltd_exp, op_data, &it, &req,
00214                                     cb_blocking, extra_lock_flags);
00215                 if (rc < 0)
00216                         GOTO(cleanup, rc);
00217 
00218                 lockh = (struct lustre_handle *)&it.it_lock_handle;
00219                 if (rc > 0 && req == NULL) {
00220                         /* slave inode is still valid */
00221                         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "slave "DFID" is still valid.\n",
00222                                PFID(&fid));
00223                         rc = 0;
00224                 } else {
00225                         /* refresh slave from server */
00226                         body = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill,
00227                                                       &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00228                         if (body == NULL) {
00229                                 if (it.it_lock_mode && lockh) {
00230                                         ldlm_lock_decref(lockh,
00231                                                  it.it_lock_mode);
00232                                         it.it_lock_mode = 0;
00233                                 }
00234                                 GOTO(cleanup, rc = -ENOENT);
00235                         }
00236 
00237                         i_size_write(inode, body->mbo_size);
00238                         inode->i_blocks = body->mbo_blocks;
00239                         set_nlink(inode, body->mbo_nlink);
00240                         LTIME_S(inode->i_atime) = body->mbo_atime;
00241                         LTIME_S(inode->i_ctime) = body->mbo_ctime;
00242                         LTIME_S(inode->i_mtime) = body->mbo_mtime;
00243                 }
00244 
00245                 md_set_lock_data(tgt->ltd_exp, &lockh->cookie, inode, NULL);
00246                 if (it.it_lock_mode != 0 && lockh != NULL) {
00247                         ldlm_lock_decref(lockh, it.it_lock_mode);
00248                         it.it_lock_mode = 0;
00249                 }
00250         }
00251 
00252 cleanup:
00253         if (req != NULL)
00254                 ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00255 
00256         OBD_FREE_PTR(op_data);
00257         RETURN(rc);
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 /*
00262  * IT_OPEN is intended to open (and create, possible) an object. Parent (pid)
00263  * may be split dir.
00264  */
00265 static int lmv_intent_open(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00266                            struct lookup_intent *it,
00267                            struct ptlrpc_request **reqp,
00268                            ldlm_blocking_callback cb_blocking,
00269                            __u64 extra_lock_flags)
00270 {
00271         struct obd_device       *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00272         struct lmv_obd          *lmv = &obd->u.lmv;
00273         struct lmv_tgt_desc     *tgt;
00274         struct mdt_body         *body;
00275         int                     rc;
00276         ENTRY;
00277 
00278         if (it->it_flags & MDS_OPEN_BY_FID) {
00279                 LASSERT(fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid2));
00280 
00281                 /* for striped directory, we can't know parent stripe fid
00282                  * without name, but we can set it to child fid, and MDT
00283                  * will obtain it from linkea in open in such case. */
00284                 if (op_data->op_mea1 != NULL)
00285                         op_data->op_fid1 = op_data->op_fid2;
00286 
00287                 tgt = lmv_find_target(lmv, &op_data->op_fid2);
00288                 if (IS_ERR(tgt))
00289                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(tgt));
00290 
00291                 op_data->op_mds = tgt->ltd_idx;
00292         } else {
00293                 LASSERT(fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1));
00294                 LASSERT(fid_is_zero(&op_data->op_fid2));
00295                 LASSERT(op_data->op_name != NULL);
00296 
00297                 tgt = lmv_locate_mds(lmv, op_data, &op_data->op_fid1);
00298                 if (IS_ERR(tgt))
00299                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(tgt));
00300         }
00301 
00302         /* If it is ready to open the file by FID, do not need
00303          * allocate FID at all, otherwise it will confuse MDT */
00304         if ((it->it_op & IT_CREAT) && !(it->it_flags & MDS_OPEN_BY_FID)) {
00305                 /*
00306                  * For lookup(IT_CREATE) cases allocate new fid and setup FLD
00307                  * for it.
00308                  */
00309                 rc = lmv_fid_alloc(NULL, exp, &op_data->op_fid2, op_data);
00310                 if (rc != 0)
00311                         RETURN(rc);
00312         }
00313 
00314         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "OPEN_INTENT with fid1="DFID", fid2="DFID","
00315                " name='%s' -> mds #%u\n", PFID(&op_data->op_fid1),
00316                PFID(&op_data->op_fid2), op_data->op_name, tgt->ltd_idx);
00317 
00318         rc = md_intent_lock(tgt->ltd_exp, op_data, it, reqp, cb_blocking,
00319                             extra_lock_flags);
00320         if (rc != 0)
00321                 RETURN(rc);
00322         /*
00323          * Nothing is found, do not access body->fid1 as it is zero and thus
00324          * pointless.
00325          */
00326         if ((it->it_disposition & DISP_LOOKUP_NEG) &&
00327             !(it->it_disposition & DISP_OPEN_CREATE) &&
00328             !(it->it_disposition & DISP_OPEN_OPEN))
00329                 RETURN(rc);
00330 
00331         body = req_capsule_server_get(&(*reqp)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00332         if (body == NULL)
00333                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00334 
00335         /* Not cross-ref case, just get out of here. */
00336         if (unlikely((body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_MDS))) {
00337                 rc = lmv_intent_remote(exp, it, &op_data->op_fid1, reqp,
00338                                        cb_blocking, extra_lock_flags);
00339                 if (rc != 0)
00340                         RETURN(rc);
00341 
00342                 body = req_capsule_server_get(&(*reqp)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00343                 if (body == NULL)
00344                         RETURN(-EPROTO);
00345         }
00346 
00347         RETURN(rc);
00348 }
00349 
00350 /*
00351  * Handler for: getattr, lookup and revalidate cases.
00352  */
00353 static int
00354 lmv_intent_lookup(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00355                   struct lookup_intent *it, struct ptlrpc_request **reqp,
00356                   ldlm_blocking_callback cb_blocking,
00357                   __u64 extra_lock_flags)
00358 {
00359         struct obd_device       *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00360         struct lmv_obd          *lmv = &obd->u.lmv;
00361         struct lmv_tgt_desc     *tgt = NULL;
00362         struct mdt_body         *body;
00363         struct lmv_stripe_md    *lsm = op_data->op_mea1;
00364         int                     rc = 0;
00365         ENTRY;
00366 
00367         /* If it returns ERR_PTR(-EBADFD) then it is an unknown hash type
00368          * it will try all stripes to locate the object */
00369         tgt = lmv_locate_mds(lmv, op_data, &op_data->op_fid1);
00370         if (IS_ERR(tgt) && (PTR_ERR(tgt) != -EBADFD))
00371                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(tgt));
00372 
00373         /* Both migrating dir and unknown hash dir need to try
00374          * all of sub-stripes */
00375         if (lsm != NULL && !lmv_is_known_hash_type(lsm->lsm_md_hash_type)) {
00376                 struct lmv_oinfo *oinfo;
00377 
00378                 oinfo = &lsm->lsm_md_oinfo[0];
00379 
00380                 op_data->op_fid1 = oinfo->lmo_fid;
00381                 op_data->op_mds = oinfo->lmo_mds;
00382                 tgt = lmv_get_target(lmv, oinfo->lmo_mds, NULL);
00383                 if (IS_ERR(tgt))
00384                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(tgt));
00385         }
00386 
00387         if (!fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid2))
00388                 fid_zero(&op_data->op_fid2);
00389 
00390         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "LOOKUP_INTENT with fid1="DFID", fid2="DFID
00391                ", name='%s' -> mds #%u lsm=%p lsm_magic=%x\n",
00392                PFID(&op_data->op_fid1), PFID(&op_data->op_fid2),
00393                op_data->op_name ? op_data->op_name : "<NULL>",
00394                tgt->ltd_idx, lsm, lsm == NULL ? -1 : lsm->lsm_md_magic);
00395 
00396         op_data->op_bias &= ~MDS_CROSS_REF;
00397 
00398         rc = md_intent_lock(tgt->ltd_exp, op_data, it, reqp, cb_blocking,
00399                             extra_lock_flags);
00400         if (rc < 0)
00401                 RETURN(rc);
00402 
00403         if (*reqp == NULL) {
00404                 /* If RPC happens, lsm information will be revalidated
00405                  * during update_inode process (see ll_update_lsm_md) */
00406                 if (op_data->op_mea2 != NULL) {
00407                         rc = lmv_revalidate_slaves(exp, op_data->op_mea2,
00408                                                    cb_blocking,
00409                                                    extra_lock_flags);
00410                         if (rc != 0)
00411                                 RETURN(rc);
00412                 }
00413                 RETURN(rc);
00414         } else if (it_disposition(it, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG) && lsm != NULL &&
00415                    lmv_need_try_all_stripes(lsm)) {
00416                 /* For migrating and unknown hash type directory, it will
00417                  * try to target the entry on other stripes */
00418                 int stripe_index;
00419 
00420                 for (stripe_index = 1;
00421                      stripe_index < lsm->lsm_md_stripe_count &&
00422                      it_disposition(it, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG); stripe_index++) {
00423                         struct lmv_oinfo *oinfo;
00424 
00425                         /* release the previous request */
00426                         ptlrpc_req_finished(*reqp);
00427                         it->it_request = NULL;
00428                         *reqp = NULL;
00429 
00430                         oinfo = &lsm->lsm_md_oinfo[stripe_index];
00431                         tgt = lmv_find_target(lmv, &oinfo->lmo_fid);
00432                         if (IS_ERR(tgt))
00433                                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(tgt));
00434 
00435                         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Try other stripes " DFID"\n",
00436                                PFID(&oinfo->lmo_fid));
00437 
00438                         op_data->op_fid1 = oinfo->lmo_fid;
00439                         it->it_disposition &= ~DISP_ENQ_COMPLETE;
00440                         rc = md_intent_lock(tgt->ltd_exp, op_data, it, reqp,
00441                                             cb_blocking, extra_lock_flags);
00442                         if (rc != 0)
00443                                 RETURN(rc);
00444                 }
00445         }
00446 
00447         /*
00448          * MDS has returned success. Probably name has been resolved in
00449          * remote inode. Let's check this.
00450          */
00451         body = req_capsule_server_get(&(*reqp)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00452         if (body == NULL)
00453                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00454 
00455         /* Not cross-ref case, just get out of here. */
00456         if (unlikely((body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_MDS))) {
00457                 rc = lmv_intent_remote(exp, it, NULL, reqp, cb_blocking,
00458                                        extra_lock_flags);
00459                 if (rc != 0)
00460                         RETURN(rc);
00461                 body = req_capsule_server_get(&(*reqp)->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00462                 if (body == NULL)
00463                         RETURN(-EPROTO);
00464         }
00465 
00466         RETURN(rc);
00467 }
00468 
00469 int lmv_intent_lock(struct obd_export *exp, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00470                     struct lookup_intent *it, struct ptlrpc_request **reqp,
00471                     ldlm_blocking_callback cb_blocking,
00472                     __u64 extra_lock_flags)
00473 {
00474         struct obd_device *obd = exp->exp_obd;
00475         int                rc;
00476         ENTRY;
00477 
00478         LASSERT(it != NULL);
00479         LASSERT(fid_is_sane(&op_data->op_fid1));
00480 
00481         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "INTENT LOCK '%s' for "DFID" '%.*s' on "DFID"\n",
00482                 LL_IT2STR(it), PFID(&op_data->op_fid2),
00483                 (int)op_data->op_namelen, op_data->op_name,
00484                 PFID(&op_data->op_fid1));
00485 
00486         rc = lmv_check_connect(obd);
00487         if (rc)
00488                 RETURN(rc);
00489 
00490         if (it->it_op & (IT_LOOKUP | IT_GETATTR | IT_LAYOUT))
00491                 rc = lmv_intent_lookup(exp, op_data, it, reqp, cb_blocking,
00492                                        extra_lock_flags);
00493         else if (it->it_op & IT_OPEN)
00494                 rc = lmv_intent_open(exp, op_data, it, reqp, cb_blocking,
00495                                      extra_lock_flags);
00496         else
00497                 LBUG();
00498 
00499         if (rc < 0) {
00500                 struct lustre_handle lock_handle;
00501 
00502                 if (it->it_lock_mode != 0) {
00503                         lock_handle.cookie = it->it_lock_handle;
00504                         ldlm_lock_decref(&lock_handle,
00505                                          it->it_lock_mode);
00506                 }
00507 
00508                 it->it_lock_handle = 0;
00509                 it->it_lock_mode = 0;
00510 
00511                 if (it->it_remote_lock_mode != 0) {
00512                         lock_handle.cookie = it->it_remote_lock_handle;
00513                         ldlm_lock_decref(&lock_handle,
00514                                          it->it_remote_lock_mode);
00515                 }
00516 
00517                 it->it_remote_lock_handle = 0;
00518                 it->it_remote_lock_mode = 0;
00519         }
00520 
00521         RETURN(rc);
00522 }
